message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a fair starting point, and we can adjust if needed.
I understand you want a larger share, but let's be reasonable. This offer considers the time value of money and is a fair deal.
Let's split it evenly this time. I understand you're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I think a 50/50 split is the fairest solution at this point.
